articles.description: The Chase fans were left distracted after Paul Sinha revealed a picture of a recent group call that featured all the Chasers. In the snap Shaun unveiled his muscly arms
articles.content:
The Chase star Shaun Wallace sent social media into meltdown after he was pictured baring his bulging biceps during a Zoom meeting.
The 60-year-old television star, known as The Dark Destroyer, ditc… [+1968 chars]

articles.title: Dan Stevens says Judi Dench's reaction to 'Cats' was too sweary to repeat - NME
articles.description: Dan Stevens has said Judi Dench's reaction to 'Cats' contained too many expletives to be repeated, adding that the star was "pretty mad"
articles.content:
Dan Stevens has said Judi Dench’s reaction to Cats was “full of expletives”.
The actor, who stars opposite Dench in Blithe Spirit, relayed his co-star’s memories of the shoot on Tom Hooper’s live-ac… [+1384 chars]
